summary: This is an email chain from October 2020 regarding the scheduling of a briefing at the FBI's Miami Field Office on November 12, 2020. The briefing, approved by the Deputy Director, concerns the results of an OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) investigation into the original Epstein case and involves the FBI Victim Services Division to support the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG).

persons.name: Program Manager FBI Victim Services Division
persons.context: The sender of the initial email, canvassing individuals for availability to assist in a briefing regarding the OPR investigation results in the Epstein case.

events.title: Mandatory Pre-Briefing Session
events.description: A mandatory session for individuals requested to participate in the November 12 briefing, scheduled from 10am to 12pm.
personsInvolved: Program Manager FBI Victim Services Division

events.title: ODAG Briefing on Epstein OPR Investigation
events.description: A briefing at the FBI Miami Field Office regarding the results of an Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) investigation into the original Epstein case, supported by the FBI Victim Services Division.
personsInvolved: Program Manager FBI Victim Services Division

keyFacts: The FBI was organizing a briefing on November 12, 2020, concerning the results of an OPR investigation into the original Epstein case.
The briefing was approved by the FBI Deputy Director and involved the FBI Victim Services Division supporting the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG).
Individuals were being canvassed based on their prior assistance with Epstein briefings in the fall of 2019.
